title: Bug 117981: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label in library file.
2. Select the label item in library outline view.
OB: When trying to select any item in the library outline view for the first time, the selection does not register.
EB: The software should allow the user to select any item in the library outline view without any issues on the first attempt.
SR: 3. Try selecting the label item again in the library outline view and observe if the selection is registered.
